entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain and fog ending before morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h then light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
